string-array.name: ability_descriptions
string-array.item: "The stench helps keep wild Pokémon away."
"The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle."
"The Pokémon's Speed stat is gradually boosted."
"The Pokémon is protected against critical hits."
"The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks."
"Prevents combatants from self destructing."
"The Pokémon is protected from paralysis."
"Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm."
"Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis."
"Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move."
"Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move."
"Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated."
"Eliminates the effects of weather."
"The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted."
"Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep."
"Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move."
"Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned."
"Powers up Fire-type moves if hit by a fire move."
"Blocks the added effects of attacks taken."
"Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused."
"Negates moves that force switching out."
"Lowers the foe's Attack stat."
"Prevents the foe from escaping."
"Inflicts damage to the foe on contact."
"Only supereffective moves will hit."
"Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves."
"Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep."
"Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe."
"Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered."
"All status problems are healed upon switching out."
"The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves."
"Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing."
"Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain."
"Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine."
"Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon."
"The Pokémon copies the foe's ability."
"Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat."
"Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe."
"The Pokémon is protected from flinching."
"Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen."
"Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn."
"Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping."
"Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves."
"The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain."
"The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle."
"The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage."
"Raises resistance to Fire-and Ice-type moves."
"The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep."
"Contact with the Pokémon may burn the foe."
"Enables sure getaway from wild Pokémon."
"Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy."
"Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered."
"The Pokémon may pick up items."
"The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns."
"Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy."
"Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation."
"Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus."
"Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus."
"CASTFORM transforms with the weather."
"Protects the Pokémon from item theft."
"The Pokémon may heal its own status problems."
"Boosts Attack if there is a status problem."
"Boosts Defense if there is a status problem."
"Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move."
"Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch."
"Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch."
"Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch."
"Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch."
"Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage."
"The Pokémon makes it sunny if it is in battle."
"Prevents the foe from fleeing."
"Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep."
"Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered."
"Boosts the power of physical attacks."
"The Pokémon is protected against critical hits."
"Eliminates the effects of weather."
"Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused."
"Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move."
"Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender."
"Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches."
"Raises evasion in a hailstorm."
"Encourages the early use of a held Berry."
"Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit."
"Raises Speed if a held item is used."
"Weakens the power of Fire-type moves."
"The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes."
"Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP."
"Adjusts power according to the foe's ability."
"Boosts the power of punching moves."
"Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned."
"Powers up moves of the same type."
"Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves."
"Heals status problems if it is raining."
"Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine."
"Boosts Speed if there is a status problem."
"All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type."
"Powers up moves if they become critical hits."
"The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks."
"Ensures the Pokémon and its foe's attacks land."
"The Pokémon moves after even slower foes."
"Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves."
"Prevents status problems in sunny weather."
"The Pokémon can't use any held items."
"Moves can be used regardless of abilities."
"Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves."
"Damages the foe landing the finishing hit."
"Senses the foe's dangerous moves."
"Determines what moves the foe has."
"Ignores any change in ability by the foe."
"Powers up 'not very effective' moves."
"Powers down super-effective moves."
"Temporarily halves Attack and Speed."
"Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes."
"The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves."
"The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm."
"Powers down super-effective moves."
"The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle."
"The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere."
"The Pokémon can check the foe's held item."
"Powers up moves that have recoil damage."
"Changes type to match the held Plate."
"Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny."
"Reduces a sleeping foe's HP."
"Steals attacking Pokémon's held item on contact."
"Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects."
"Inverts stat modifiers."
"Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries."
"Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered."
"Halves Attack and Special Attack below 50%% HP."
"Has a 30%% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon."
"Has a 30%% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn."
"Decreases damage inflicted against friendly Pokémon."
"Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by any move."
"Doubles the Pokémon's weight."
"Halves the Pokémon's weight."
"Halves damage taken from full HP."
"Increases Attack to 1.5× when poisoned."
"Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned."
"Restores any held Berry after the turn on which it is used."
"Protects against damaging moves from friendly Pokémon."
"Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn."
"Protects against damage from weather."
"Has a 20%% chance of poisoning Pokémon upon contact when attacking."
"Heals for 1/3 max HP upon leaving battle."
"Protects against Defense drops."
"Doubles Speed during a sandstorm."
"Has a 50%% chance of protecting against non-damaging moves that inflict major status ailments."
"Strengthens moves when moving last."
"Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move."
"Transforms upon entering battle."
"Ignores Light Screen, Reflect, and Safeguard."
"Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to mummify on contact."
"Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon."
"Raises Attack when hit by dark-type moves."
"Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a Dark, Ghost, or Bug move."
"Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user."
"Absorbs Grass moves, raising Attack one stage{mechanic:stat modifier}."
"Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage."
"Strengthens Rock, Ground, and Steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm."
"Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact."
"Changes Darmanitan to daruma mode below 50%% max HP."
"Raises moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon."
"Makes moves ignore targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent them."
"Makes moves ignore targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent them."
"Changes Normal-type moves into Flying-type, and boosts their power by 30%%."
"Reverses the effects of Aura abilities."
"Restores 30%% HP when eating a berry."
"Boost the power of Dark-type moves used by all Pokémon by 1/3"
"Boost the power of Fairy-type moves used by all Pokémon by 1/3"
"Prevents Grass-type partners from having stats reduced by the opponent."
"Halves damage from Physical moves."
"Boosts the power of Pulse moves and Aura Sphere."
"Adds an extra hit at 1/2 power to all single target attacks."
"Changes Normal-type moves into Fairy-type, and boosts their power by 30%%."
"Changes the user's type to match the attack used."
"Changes Normal-type moves into Ice-type, and boosts their power by 30%%."
"Changes Aegislash's form based on the move used."
"Boosts the power of biting moves by 30%%."
"Prevents all Pokémon on the user's side of the field from falling asleep."
"Boosts the power of contact moves by 30%%."
"Raises Special Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered."
"Raises the priority of all Flying-type moves by 1."
"Lowers opponents Speed by 1 stage on contact."
"Prevents all Pokémon on the user's side of the field from infatuation and altered mental states."
"Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves."
"Boosts Defense by 50%% in Grassy Terrain."
"Steals attacking Pokémon's held item on contact."
"Transfers held item to partner after the partner consumes their item."
"The Pokémon creates intense sunlight if it appears in battle that lasts until the Pokémon leaves the battle."
"The Pokémon creates a heavy rain if it appears in battle that lasts until the Pokémon leaves the battle."
"The Pokémon stirs up strong winds that eliminate the effects of weather and prevents weather changes until the Pokémon leaves the battle."

string-array.name: ability_battle_descriptions
string-array.item: "Adds a 10%% chance to flinch the opponent Pokémon to all of the moves used by a Pokémon with this ability that cannot already cause flinching. If a Pokémon with this ability is the first in your belt, decreases the chance of a wild encounter."
"Summons Rain Dance for 5 turns when a Pokémon with this ability enters the field."
"Raises the Speed of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage every turn."
"Prevents moves from being a critical hit when targetting a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents One-hit KO moves from hitting a Pokémon with this ability. Ensures that a Pokémon with this ability will survive with at least 1 HP if hit at full health."
"Prevents the use of Self-Destruct or Explosion, and the effect of Aftermath, as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Paralyzed."
"Raises Evasion of Pokémon with this ability by 20%% during Sandstorm."
"Has a 30%% chance to Paralyze a Pokémon every time they use a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Heals a Pokémon with this ability for 1/4 of its max HP when hit by an Electric move and nullifies its effect."
"Heals a Pokémon with this ability for 1/4 of its max HP when hit by a Water move and nullifies its effect."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from being Attracted or affected by Captivate or Taunt."
"Prevents weather from having any effect as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Raises the accuracy of moves used by a Pokémon with this ability by 30%% of their original value."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Asleep."
"Changes the type of a Pokémon with this ability to that of the last damaging move that hit it."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Poisoned."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability immune to Fire moves, and raises the damage of its Fire moves by 50%% until it leaves the field when hit by one."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability immune to added effects from the opponent Pokémon's attacking moves."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Confused."
"Prevents the opponent from forcing a Pokémon with this ability to switch out."
"Lowers the opponent Pokémon's Attack one stage when a Pokémon with this ability switches in."
"Prevents opponent Pokémon, except for Ghost Pokémon, from switching out or running away as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Damages Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every time they use a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability only vulnerable to super-effective attacks."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability immune to Ground moves, Spikes, Toxic Spikes and Sticky Web, as well as the effect of Arena Trap."
"Has a 30%% chance to make a Pokémon either Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Asleep every time they use a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"When a Pokémon with this ability becomes Burned, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Badly Poisoned by the opponent, inflicts the same status to the opponent Pokémon."
"Prevents the stats of a Pokémon with this ability from being lowered by the opponent."
"Heals all status conditions of a Pokémon with this ability when it leaves the field."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability draw to itself and be immune to all Electric moves, and raises its Special Attack by one stage every time it is hit by one."
"Doubles the chance of an attacking move's added effect occurring when used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Doubles the Speed of a Pokémon with this ability during Rain Dance."
"Doubles the Speed of a Pokémon with this ability during Sunny Day."
"If a Pokémon with this ability is the first in your belt, doubles the chance of a wild encounter."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability copy the ability of the opponent when it enters the field."
"Doubles the Attack of a Pokémon with this ability."
"Has a 30%% chance to Poison a Pokémon every time they use a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from flinching."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Frozen."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Burned."
"Prevents Steel-type opponents, that are not also Ghost-type, from switching out or running away as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."

"Makes a Pokémon with this ability immune to Boomburst, Bug Buzz, Chatter, Confide, Disarming Voice, Echoed Voice, Grass Whistle, Growl, Hyper Voice, Metal Sound, Noble Roar, Parting Shot, Perish Song, Relic Song, Roar, Round, Screech, Sing, Snarl, Snore, Supersonic, and Uproar."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability regain 1/16 its max HP every turn during Rain Dance."
"Summons Sandstorm for 5 turns when a Pokémon with this ability enters the field."
"Makes opponent Pokémon use 2 PP instead of 1 when they target a Pokémon with this ability."
"Halves the damage a Pokémon with this ability receives from Fire and Ice moves."
"Halves the turns that a Pokémon with this ability spends Asleep, rounded down, including from Rest."
"Has a 30%% chance of Burning a Pokémon every time they use a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Allows a Pokémon with this ability to always run from wild battles."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from having its Accuracy lowered by the opponent, and ignores the opponent's evasion boosts."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from having its Attack lowered by the opponent."

"If a Pokémon other than the one with this Ability consumes a held item, lets this Pokémon obtain that item. After battle, a Pokémon with this ability will have a 10%% chance to be find an item if it was not already."
"Forces a Pokémon with this ability to do nothing every other turn it spends in battle, starting with the second."

"Raises Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%%, but makes its physical moves have 80%% of their usual accuracy. If a Pokémon with this ability is first on your belt, the chance of a wild encounter with higher level Pokémon increases."
"Has a 30%% chance to make a Pokémon Attracted every time they use a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Raises the Special Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% when it is partnered by a Pokémon with Minus."
"Raises the Special Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% when it is partnered by a Pokémon with Plus."
"Makes the type of a Pokémon with this ability change to match the weather: Rain Dance, Sunny Day, or Hail."
"Prevents the item of a Pokémon with this ability from being removed by the opponent. If a Pokémon with this ability is first on your belt, fishing is made easier."
"Each turn, has a 1/3 chance of healing all status conditions of a Pokémon with this ability."
"When a Pokémon with this ability has a major status condition, raises its Attack by 50%%. Ignores the Attack loss from being Burned."
"When a Pokémon with this ability has a major status condition, raises its Defense by 50%%."
"When the opponent uses absorption moves on Pokémon with this ability, causes it to lose HP instead of gaining."
"When the HP of a Pokémon with this ability is 1/3 its max or lower, boosts the power of its Grass moves by 50%%."
"When the HP of a Pokémon with this ability is 1/3 its max or lower, boosts the power of its Fire moves by 50%%."
"When the HP of a Pokémon with this ability is 1/3 its max or lower, boosts the power of its Water moves by 50%%."
"When the HP of a Pokémon with this ability is 1/3 its max or lower, boosts the power of its Bug moves by 50%%."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from taking recoil damage from its own attacks."
"Summons Sunny Day for 5 turns when a Pokémon with this ability enters the field."
"Prevents opponent Pokémon, except for Flying-type Pokémon, Ghost-type Pokémon, and Pokémon with Levitate, from running or being switched out as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from becoming Asleep."
"Prevents the stats of a Pokémon with this ability from being lowered by the opponent."
"Doubles the Attack of a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents moves from being a critical hit when targetting a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents weather from having any effect as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Raises Evasion of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% when it is Confused."
"Raises Speed of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage when it is hit by an Electric move, and nullifies the effect of that move."
"Raises the power of moves used by a Pokémon with this ability by 25%% when fighting an opponent of the same gender, but lowers them by 25%% when fighting an opponent of the opposite gender."
"Raises Speed of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage every time it flinches."
"Raises Evasion of a Pokémon with this ability by 20%% during Hail."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability eat held berries triggered by low HP at 1/2 its max HP rather than 1/4."
"Raises the Attack of a Pokémon with this ability to its maximum stage when it is hit with a critical hit."
"Doubles the Speed of a Pokémon with this ability when it consumes its held item until it switches out."
"Halves the damage a Pokémon with this ability takes from Fire moves, and from a Burn."
"Doubles the effectiveness of stat changes on a Pokémon with this ability, although the maximum of six is unchanged."

"Damages a Pokémon with this ability for 1/8 its max HP per turn during Sunny Day, and heals it by 1/8 its max HP per turn during Rain Dance. Makes a Pokémon with this ability take 25%% more damage from Fire attacks, but also makes Water attacks heal it for 1/4 its max HP."
"When a Pokémon with this ability enters the field, raises one stage in the Attack stat corresponding to its opponent's weaker Defense stat."

"Boosts the power of Bullet Punch, Comet Punch, Dizzy Punch, Drain Punch, Dynamic Punch, Fire Punch, Focus Punch, Hammer Arm, Ice Punch, Mach Punch, Mega Punch, Meteor Mash, Shadow Punch, Sky Uppercut, and Thunder Punch by 20%% when used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Heals a Pokémon with this ability by 1/8 its max HP each turn when it is Poisoned or Badly Poisoned."
"Changes the Same Type Attack Bonus for a Pokémon with this ability from 1.5x to 2x."
"Ensures that a Pokémon with this ability will always hit five times with 2-to-5-hit moves."
"Cures a Pokémon with this ability of any major status condition during Rain Dance."
"Damages a Pokémon with this ability for 1/8 its max HP per turn but raises its Special Attack by 50%% during Sunny Day."
"When a Pokémon with this ability has a major status condition, raises its Speed by 50%%. Ignored the Speed loss from being Paralyzed."
"Changes all moves of a Pokémon with this ability to be Normal-type."
"Boosts the power of critical hits used by a Pokémon with this ability by 50%%."
"Renders a Pokémon with this ability immune to damage not caused directly by an attack."
"Ensures that all moves used by and on a Pokémon with this ability will hit."
"Ensures that a Pokémon with this ability will move last in its priority bracket."
"Boosts the power of moves with 60 Base Power or less used by a Pokémon with this ability by 50%%."
"Renders a Pokémon with this ability immune to major status conditions during Sunny Day."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability unable to receive the effects of its held item."
"Prevents opponent abilities from hindering moves used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Raises the critical hit rate of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage."
"When a Pokémon with this ability is fainted by a contact move, damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP."
"When a Pokémon with this ability switches in, causes it to shudder if the opponent has any moves that are super-effective on it, or One-hit KO moves."
"When a Pokémon with this ability switches in, gives a message warning it of the opponent's attack with the highest Base Power."
"Causes a Pokémon with this ability to ignore all of the opponent's stat changes except for Speed."
"Doubles the power of not very effective attacks used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Lowers the damage a Pokémon with this ability takes from super-effective attacks by 25%%."
"Halves the Attack and Speed of a Pokémon with this ability for the first five turns it is in battle."
"Allows a Pokémon with this ability to hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal and Fighting moves."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability draw in and be immune to all Water moves, and raises its Special Attack by one stage every time it is hit by one."
"Heals a Pokémon with this ability for 1/16 its max HP each turn during Hail."
"Lowers the damage a Pokémon with this ability takes from super-effective attacks by 25%%."
"Summons Hail for 5 turns when a Pokémon with this ability enters the field."
"Causes a Pokémon with this ability to have a chance to collect Honey after a battle."
"When a Pokémon with this ability switches in, lets it see what item its opponent is holding."

"Boosts the power of Brave Bird, Double-Edge, Flare Blitz, Head Charge, Head Smash, Hi Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Submission, Take Down, Volt Tackle, Wild Charge and Wood Hammer by 20%% when used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Changes the type of a Pokémon with this ability to match the Plate it holds."
"During Sunny Day, raises Attack and Special Defense of a Pokémon with this ability and its partners by 50%%."
"Causes the opponent Pokémon to lose 1/8 its max HP every turn it is Sleeping as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"When a Pokémon with this ability is hit by a contact move, lets it steal the opponent's held item if it's not holding one already."
"Boosts the power of moves with secondary effects by 30%% in exchange for the secondary effect itself, if used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Reverses all stat changes that take effect on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents the opponent from consuming held Berries as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Raises the Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 2 stages every time the opponent lowers any of its stats."
"Lowers Attack and Special Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% while it has 1/2 its max HP or lower."
"Has a 30%% chance to Disable any attacking move used on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Each turn, has a 30%% chance to heal any major status condition from partners adjacent to a Pokémon with this ability."
"Reduces by 25%% damage that partners of a Pokémon with this ability receive."
"Lowers Defense of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage and raises its Speed by one stage when it is hit by a physical attack."
"Doubles the weight of a Pokémon with this ability."
"Halves the weight of a Pokémon with this ability."
"Halves the damage taken from an attack by a Pokémon with this ability if it has max HP."
"Raises Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% while it is Poisoned."
"Raises Special Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% while it is Burned."
"Each turn, has a 50%% chance to regenerate the Berry consumed by a Pokémon with this ability. Chance is 100%% during Sunny Day."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability immune to damage from its partners."
"Each turn, raises one random stat of a Pokémon with this ability by two stages, and lowers a different random stat by one stage, including Evasion and Accuracy."

"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from taking damage from weather effects, and from being affected by Cotton Spore, Poison Powder, Powder, Rage Powder, Sleep Powder, Spore, Stun Spore, and Effect Spore."
"Has a 20%% chance to Poison the target of a contact move used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Recovers up to 1/3 max HP of a Pokémon with this ability when it leaves the field."
"Prevents a Pokémon with this ability from having its Defense lowered by the opponent."
"Doubles the Speed of a Pokémon with this ability during Sandstorm."
"Lowers the accuracy of any non-attacking move targetting a Pokémon with this ability to 50 if it is higher."
"Boosts the power of all moves used by a Pokémon with this ability by 30%% if it attacks after the opponent."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability copy the appearance of the last non-fainted Pokémon in its trainer's party. The effect fades away after the Pokémon is hit by a damaging move."
"Makes a Pokémon with this ability transform into the opponent as soon as it enters the field."
"Allows a Pokémon with this ability to ignore the effects of the opponent's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist and Substitute when using a move."
"Changes the Ability of any Pokémon attacking with a contact move a Pokémon with this ability to Mummy until it leaves the field."
"Raises the Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage every time it knocks out a Pokémon."
"Raises the Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage every time it is hit by a Dark attack."
"Raises the Speed of a Pokémon with this ability by one stage every time it is hit by a Bug, Ghost or Dark attack."

"If an opponent targets a Pokémon with this ability with a status, stat altering, immunity removing, or hazard move, Defog, Roar, Whirlwind, or Spite, nullifies that move and instead makes the target use it on the original user."
"Grants a Pokémon with this ability immunity to all Grass moves and raises its Attack by one stage when hit by one."
"Raises priority of all non-attacking moves used by a Pokémon with this ability by 1."
"Boosts the power of all Ground, Rock and Steel type attacks used by a Pokémon with this ability during Sandstorm."
"Damages the opponent for 1/8 its max HP every time it uses a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Changes Darmanitan into Zen Mode when it falls under 1/2 its max HP."
"Raises accuracy of all moves used by a Pokémon with this ability and its partners by 10%%."
"Prevents opponent abilities from hindering moves used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents opponent abilities from hindering moves used by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Changes all Normal-type moves used by a Pokémon with this Ability to Flying-type, and boosts their power by 30%%."
"Makes Dark Aura and Fairy Aura reduce by 1/4 the power of their respective type as long as a Pokémon with this ability is on the field."
"Restores the HP of a Pokémon with this ability by 30%% when it eats a Berry."
"Boosts the power of all Dark-type moves used by any Pokémon on the field by 1/3."
"Boosts the power of all Fairy-type moves used by any Pokémon on the field by ⅓."
"Prevents the stats of Grass-type partners of a Pokémon with this ability from being lowered by the opponent."
"Halves the damage taken from physical moves by a Pokémon with this ability."
"Boosts the power of Aura Sphere, Dark Pulse, Dragon Pulse, Heal Pulse and Water Pulse used by a Pokémon with this ability by 50%%."
"Allows all attacking moves that strike a single target a single time used by a Pokémon with this ability to strike a second time with halved power."
"Changes all Normal-type moves used by a Pokémon with this Ability to Fairy-type, and boosts their power by 30%%."
"Before a Pokémon with this ability uses any move, changes its type to match the move used."
"Changes all Normal-type moves used by a Pokémon with this Ability to Ice-type, and boosts their power by 30%%."
"Changes Aegislash into Blade Forme when it uses any offensive move, and changes Aegislash into Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield."
"Boosts the power of Bite, Crunch, Fire Fang, Hyper Fang, Ice Fang, Poison Fang and Thunder Fang used by a Pokémon with this ability by 50%%."
"Prevents any Pokémon on the side of a Pokémon with this ability from falling asleep."
"Boosts the power of contact moves used by a Pokémon with this ability by 30%%."
"Raises the Special Attack of a Pokémon with this ability by 2 stages every time the enemy lowers any of its stats."
"Raises priority of all Flying-type moves used by a Pokémon with this ability by 1."
"Lowers the Speed of the opponent every time it uses a contact move on a Pokémon with this ability."
"Prevents any Pokémon on the side of a Pokémon with this ability from being infatuated, or being under the effect of Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment."

"Makes a Pokémon with this ability immune to Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Barrage, Bullet Seed, Egg Bomb, Electro Ball, Energy Ball, Focus Blast, Gyro Ball, Ice Ball, Magnet Bomb, Mist Ball, Mud Bomb, Octazooka, Rock Wrecker, Searing Shot, Seed Bomb, Shadow Ball, Sludge Bomb, Weather Ball, and Zap Cannon."
"Raises the Defense of a Pokémon with this ability by 50%% while Grassy Terrain is in effect."
"When a Pokémon with this ability uses an attacking move and it is holding no item, steals the opponent's held item."
"When a partner of a Pokémon with this ability consumes an item in battle, transfers the item held by the Pokémon with this ability to it."

"Summons the extremely harsh sunlight weather condition for as long as a Pokémon with this ability stays on the field. Boosts the power of Fire moves by 50%%, and causes Water moves to fail. Prevents the weather from being changed by Rain Dance, Sunny Day, Sandstorm, Hail, Drizzle, Drought, Sand Stream, or Snow Warning. Makes all Pokémon immune to being frozen."

"Summons the heavy rain weather condition for as long as a Pokémon with this ability stays on the field. Boosts the power of Water moves by 50%%, and causes Fire moves to fail. Prevents the weather from being changed by Rain Dance, Sunny Day, Sandstorm, Hail, Drizzle, Drought, Sand Stream, or Snow Warning."

"Summons the strong winds weather condition for as long as a Pokémon with this ability stays on the field. Causes moves of a type that is normally super-effective against Flying to only deal normal damage against Flying. Prevents the weather from being changed by Rain Dance, Sunny Day, Sandstorm, Hail, Drizzle, Drought, Sand Stream, or Snow Warning."
